about_the_game:
Skill based gameplay!

Are you quick enough to slide underneath the sizzling slime balls, catch the game-winning airstrike, and nuke the last brick cluster into oblivion? Or should you play it safe and use a calculated bank shot to trigger that dynamite chain in a flurry of combo hits? It’s all about combining movement, timing and precision with split-second decision making.

Progressive levels filled with challenges!

Smash your way through 50 levels carefully designed to gradually challenge even the most seasoned veterans of the genre. It seems easy at first, but one wrong move and you'll find yourself back at the checkpoint, wishing you hadn't hit that floating laser switch with your combo split!

Devious enemies, interactive obstacles and detailed power-ups!

Face off against shifting bricks, death beams, explosive barrels, hover mines, floating portal fiends, fireballs, and laser traps. You'll have your paddle shrunk, slimed, and even insta-killed by death itself. You'll drop airstrikes, load up blasters, toggle trap doors, crack safes, raise shield walls, toggle lasers, maybe even bounce a bomb into a cluster of bunker bricks for some sweet, sweet revenge!

No Bomb-Bats or Slimegoons were harmed in the making of this game*

*We did lose a few Skulls when a Spikey fractured.

name: Brickade

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: A skill-based journey through the world of the brick-breaking arcade genre. Master precise angle shots, get slimed, dodge falling barrels, crack open safes, or drop a precision airstrike on a swarm of flying bomb-bats blocking a laser switch... all while smashing every brick in sight.
